message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $22,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $22,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $8,000 for it.

Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your perspective on the price, but $8,000 is significantly below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000? It's a fair offer considering the quality and potential of this product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $18,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  I'm willing to come down a bit further to $16,000. I believe this reflects the true value of the product while still being a good deal for you.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $16,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product.
